DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I , open label study evaluate safety , tolerability , immunogenicity INO-1400 alone combination INO-9012 , deliver electroporation subject high-risk solid tumor cancer evidence disease surgery standard therapy . Subjects enrol one six treatment arm . Subjects assess accord standard care . Restaging image study perform assess disease relapse per NCCN guideline . RECIST use validate finding case relapse .
DOC.brief_title: hTERT Immunotherapy Alone Combination With IL-12 DNA Followed Electroporation Adults With Solid Tumors High Risk Relapse
